page.title: 09THE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND ALVES
page.content: Alves Church, a Church of Scotland, is situated half a mile west of the village of Alves. It was built in 1878. The congregation of 125 of which 16 have joined in the last two years, come from a wide area around Alves. The Church was linked with Burghead Church in May 1982 so we have the same minister, the Rev. Roy McKenzie who came to Alves in October 1982. Associated with the church are the Sunday School and the Guild. The Sunday School was only started on Harvest Thanksgiving Day in 1984.
